page.title: 15OUR ANCESTORS (cont)
page.content: both born in Gwent,19 of the children had only 1 parent born in Gwent, 22 parents had no connection with Gwent. 49 mothers and 52 fathers were born in various parts of Wales. 14 mothers and fathers were born in England. 11 were born in Scotland, Ireland, Spain, Germany, Malta,Austria and New Zealand.Of the 70 children who took part 52 Grandparents were connected to Gwent,16 being born in Gwent while 8 grandparents had no connection with Gwent. Our survey seems to show there is very little movement into Cwmbran during the present time .The children who were not born locally moved to Cwmbran with their families seeking employment.Most of our parents were born before the 'New Town'was built .These people did not travel far to live here.
